pr_title: The last of the getTimeFieldSpec calls

timeline.message: The last of the getTimeFieldSpec calls

timeline.bodyText:
We need to remove the time transform here because the time has already been transformed.
Please also update the javadoc
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

replies.bodyText:
I believe we don't need to change the schema because:

The RecordTransformer is a pass through
The RecordReader is just looping over physical column names so it only has outgoing

We shouldn't need to remove incoming, because that implies that we need to remove transform functions from all field specs.
replies.author: npawar

timeline.bodyText: Annotate timeColumnName as nullable or check it on the caller side
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang
Jackie-Jiang
Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: Do we still want this support? (Realtime table without time column)
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

replies.bodyText:
realtime table without time will never happen right?
Also after changing the getUpdatedSchema method, this test becomes irrelevant
replies.author: npawar

replies.bodyText: I think @fx19880617 added that support. Any opinion on this?
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: Move getColumnNames() out of the loop
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang
